class.name: Shape4D
class.description: Shape4D is the base class for all 4D shape resources, such as [BoxShape4D], [SphereShape4D], [CapsuleShape4D], and [CylinderShape4D]. It can be used to provide a shape resource to a [CollisionShape4D] node.

method.name: _has_point
method.description: Override this method if you are implementing a custom 4D shape. It will be called whenever the user calls [method has_point].

method.name: has_point
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the 4D shape contains the given point. Points exactly on the surface are considered inside.
